s.text: Tomorrow, the paper will print the results of media writer David Shaw's investigation into the matter.
These sites are jockeying to build "brand names in the new millennium" (NYT), by hotly pursuing tactics that "would be, in any normal business, ruinous" (WP).
: Fear of something worse around the corner persuades the administration to live with known evils.

Below their note the paper runs its statement of principles: "Our mission is to provide the news, information, analysis and commentary [readers] need to lead successful lives and to be effective citizens in a democracy."
